name: Mayahuel's Rosa Amargo
description: Grapefruit liqueur and mezcal give this funky spin on the Negroni by Mayahuel's Jeremy Oertel a smoky-tart twist.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add mezcal, grapefruit liqueur, Dolin Blanc, and Campari. Stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Express grapefruit oils on top of the glass by twisting peel skin face-down over the drink and rubbing the peel along the glass's rim. Discard twist and serve.
